titleStmt.title: Articles to be enquired of, in the kynges maiesties visitacion
Visitation articles. 1547
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)
Church of England.

notesStmt.note: Caption title. An edition of "Articles to be enquyred of, in the kynges majesties visitacion" (STC 10114).
Printers name from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Identified as STC 10112 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
